Capitalizes the first letter of a string. Use array destructuring and  String.prototype.toUpperCase()  to capitalize the first letter of the string.
Use  Array.prototype.join('')  to combine the capitalized  first  with the  ...rest  of the…

Checks if all elements in an array are equal. Use  Array.prototype.every()  to check if all the elements of the array are the same as the first one.
Elements in the array are compared using the strict comparison operator, which does not account for…

Calculates the date after adding the ginen number of business days. Use  Array.from()  to construct an array with  length  equal to the  count  of business days to be added.
Use  Array.prototype.reduce()  to iterate over the array, starting from…

Calculates the date of  n  days from the given date, returning its string representation. Use  new Date()  to create a date object from the first argument. Use  Date.prototype.getDate()  and  Date.prototype.setDate()  to add  n  days to the given…
